CTakeDamageInfo/GetAmmoType.description: Returns the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetAttacker.description: Returns the attacker ( character who originated the attack ), for example a player or an NPC that shot the weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetBaseDamage.description: Returns the initial unmodified by skill level (

CTakeDamageInfo/GetDamageForce.description: Returns a vector representing the damage force.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetDamagePosition.description: Returns the position where the damage was or is going to be applied to.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetDamageType.description: Returns a bitflag which indicates the damage type(s) of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetInflictor.description: Returns the inflictor of the damage. This is not necessarily a weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo/GetReportedPosition.description: Returns the initial, unmodified position where the damage occured.

CTakeDamageInfo/IsBulletDamage.description: Returns true if the damage was caused by a bullet.

CTakeDamageInfo/IsDamageType.description: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains the damage type specified.

CTakeDamageInfo/IsExplosionDamage.description: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains explosion damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/IsFallDamage.description: Returns whenever the damageinfo contains fall damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/ScaleDamage.description: Scales the damage by the given value.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetAmmoType.description: Changes the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetAttacker.description: Sets the attacker ( character who originated the attack ) of the damage, for example a player or an NPC.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetDamageForce.description: Sets the directional force of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetDamagePosition.description: Sets the position of where the damage gets applied to.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetInflictor.description: Sets the inflictor of the damage for example a weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetMaxDamage.description: Sets the maximum damage the object can cause.

CTakeDamageInfo/SetReportedPosition.description: Sets the origin of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo/SubtractDamage.description: Subtracts the specified amount from the damage.
